description: Focused on audio transcription and machine learning workflows, deploying OpenAI's Whisper model to enhance data accessibility for ML applications.

Documented comprehensive pipeline architecture for future development

position: Python Developer, AI and ML Engineer

Implemented user feedback mechanisms and A/B testing for continuous model improvement
